name: Super Deference Fighter
description:
This scientifically accurate bowing simulator teaches you everything you need to know about showing deference in appropriate business and other social situations.

Rapidly tap the BOW button to lower yourself before your adversary. Once you are in your "deference zone", make with the GAZE button to stare at your opponents feet. First contender to show deference three times "wins."

Mac version includes fancy effects and Xbox 360 Gamepad support.

Play the Web (Flash) Version online

INSTRUCTIONS: WEB

BOW - X (Player 1), M (Player 2) GAZE - Z (Player 2), N (Player 2)

INSTRUCTIONS: MAC

BOW - B button GAZE - X button

OPTIONS

Switch between Keyboard / Xbox Instructions: TAB Difficult Setting: 1 2 3 (on keyboard)
